price: Glory be to the Lord of the heavens and earth, Lord of the Throne, far above what they ascribe [to Him].
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
